titles.title: Thy Word Have I Hid in My Heart

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: Thy Word is a lamp to my feet, A light to my path alway, To guide and to save me from sin, And show me the heav'nly way.

verse.name: c
verse.lines: Thy Word have I hid in my heart, That I might not sin against thee; That I might not sin, that I might not sin, Thy Word have I hid in my heart.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: Forever, O Lord, is Thy Word Established and fixed on high; Thy faithfulness unto all men Abideth for ever nigh.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: At morning, at noon, and at night I ever will give Thee praise; For Thou art my portion, O Lord, And shall be thro' all my days!

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: Thro' Him whom Thy Word hath foretold, The Savior and Morning Star, Salvation and peace have been bro't To those who have strayed afar.
